1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    abCoxBuild,
8    abCoxCalc,
9    abCoxFill,
10    abCoxIrrep,
11    abCoxPosition,
12    abCoxPrefix,
13    abCoxReduce,
14    abCoxSyntax,
15    -- * Message
16    ambInfixes,
17    lackArg,
18    unkCop,
19    unkCox,
20    unkGlobalVar,
21    unkRefVar,
22    unkShow,
23    unkTerm,
24    unmatchBlank,
25    -- * Utility
26    detailTermRel,
27  ) where
28
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                 as B
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax               as S
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type            as D
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Message       as Msg
33
34
35-- --------------------------------------------  Abortable scope
36
37-- | Abortable scope for cox building.
38abCoxBuild :: S.TTreeTo (B.MapAb b)
39abCoxBuild = Msg.abortableTree "cox-build"
40
41-- | Abortable scope for cox calculation.
42abCoxCalc :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
43abCoxCalc = B.abortable "cox-calc"
44
45-- | Abortable scope for cox filling.
46abCoxFill :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
47abCoxFill = B.abortable "cox-fill"
48
49-- | Abortable scope for irreducible expression.
50abCoxIrrep :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
51abCoxIrrep = B.abortable "cox-irrep"
52
53-- | Abortable scope for cox position.
54abCoxPosition :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
55abCoxPosition = B.abortable "cox-position"
56
57-- | Abortable scope for cox prefix.
58abCoxPrefix :: S.TTreeTo (B.MapAb b)
59abCoxPrefix = Msg.abortableTree "cox-prefix"
60
61-- | Abortable scope for cox reduction.
62abCoxReduce :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
63abCoxReduce = B.abortable "cox-reduce"
64
65-- | Abortable scope for cox syntax.
66abCoxSyntax :: S.TTreeTo (B.MapAb b)
67abCoxSyntax = Msg.abortableTree "cox-syntax"
68
69
70-- --------------------------------------------  Message
71
72-- | Ambiguous infix operators
73ambInfixes :: [String] -> B.Ab a
74ambInfixes = Left . B.abortLines "Ambiguous infix operators"
75
76-- | Lack of argument
77lackArg :: String -> B.Ab a
78lackArg = Left . B.abortLine "Lack of argument"
79
80-- | Unknown content operator
81unkCop :: String -> B.Ab a
82unkCop = Left . B.abortLine "Unknown content operator"
83
84-- | Unknown expression
85unkCox :: String -> B.Ab a
86unkCox = Left . B.abortLine "Unknown expression"
87
88-- | Unknown global variable
89unkGlobalVar :: String -> B.Ab a
90unkGlobalVar = Left . B.abortLine "Unknown global variable"
91
92-- | Unknown reference for variable
93unkRefVar :: (String, Int) -> [String] -> B.Ab a
94unkRefVar (v, k) vs = Left $ B.abortLines "Unknown reference for variable"
95                [ "look up " ++ var (v, k)
96                , "in " ++ args vs ]
97
98-- | Unknown object
99unkShow :: (Show x) => x -> B.Ab a
100unkShow x = Left $ B.abortLines "Unknown object" $ lines $ show x
101
102-- | Unknown term name
103unkTerm :: [S.TermName] -> D.Head -> B.Ab a
104unkTerm ns he1 =
105    Left $ B.abortLines "Unknown term name"
106         $ detailTermRel "Unknown" ns he1
107
108-- | Unmatch blank (bug)
109unmatchBlank :: String -> Int -> String -> [String] -> B.Ab a
110unmatchBlank v k _ vs =
111    Left $ B.abortLines "Unmatch blank (bug)"
112           [ "look up " ++ var (v, k)
113           , "in " ++ args vs ]
114
115-- ----------------------  Utility
116
117var :: (String, Int) -> String
118var (v, k) = v ++ "/" ++ show k
119
120args :: [String] -> String
121args vs = unwords $ map var $ zip vs [1..]
122
123-- | Terms and input relation heading.
124detailTermRel :: String -> [S.TermName] -> D.Head -> [String]
125detailTermRel label ns he1 = detail where
126    detail = [label] ++ indent ns' ++ ["Input relation"] ++ indent ns1
127    indent = map ("  " ++)
128    ns'    = map S.showTermName ns
129    ns1    = B.linesFrom $ D.headExplain he1
130
